message:
2018-12-28

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/11/29/cnn10/ten-content-fri/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1811/30/sn.01.html

오늘은 강수량을 인위적으로 늘리려는 인간의 시도에 관한 에피소드가 재미있습니다.

For today, the episode about attempt to incrase precipitation artificially is interesting to watch.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 01:50
The stage is set for meetings and drama at this year's Group of 20 (G20) summit in Argentina.

01:50 - 08:00
How scientists try to increase precipitation through cloud seeding.
